Uses of Package
monsterfighter.core

Packages that use monsterfighter.core
Package
Description
monsterfighter.core
Package containing the classes that provide core functionality to the monster fighter application
monsterfighter.ui
Contains classes that provide user interface support to the monster fighter application
monsterfighter.ui.gui
Package containing classes that provide functionality to the graphical user interface for the monster fighter application
  • Classes in monsterfighter.core used by monsterfighter.core
    Class
    Description
    Battle
    Abstract class that models the common functionality of a battle.
    Battles
    Class that models the construction of the Battle's used in the application.
    GameEnvironment.Difficulty
    Represents the difficulty of a game.
    Item
    Class that models an item
    Item.Stat
    Represents the stat that an Item affects.
    Monster
    Class that models a monster
    Monster.Status
    Represents the state of a Monster.
    Monster.Type
    Represents the type of a Monster.
    Player
    Class that models a player
    Purchasable
    Models the purchasable interface that allows an object to be bought from a Shop and sold for gold
    RandomEvent
    Class that models random events that can occur when a player rests in the monster fighter application
    Shop
    Class that models a shop
  • Classes in monsterfighter.core used by monsterfighter.ui
    Class
    Description
    GameEnvironment
    Manages the Monster Fighter application.

    Class
    Description
    GameEnvironment
    Manages the Monster Fighter application.
    Item
    Class that models an item
    Monster
    Class that models a monster

    Models the purchasable interface that allows an object to be bought from a Shop and sold for gold
